product_name: COSRXThe Retinol 0.1 Cream with Super Vitamin E + Pathenol
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingThe Retinol 0.1 Cream with Super Vitamin E + Pathenol from COSRX is an irritation-reduced solution created with the optimal ratio of key ingredients for first-time retinol users just starting to notice the appearance of fine lines caused by dry skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsPure retinol (Vitamin A) : Decreases wrinkles and fine linesPanthenol : Protects and moisturizes skinAdenosine : Skin cell activation. Improves elasticity and wrinklesTocotrienol (Super Vitamin E) : Reduces visible signs of aging and skin damageItem 2607592How To UseSTART SMALL AND SLOW! After using essence or serum, pat a small amount using your ring finger. Apply evenly over the face, neck, and onto parts with wrinkle concerns. Limit initial use to three times per week; gradually increase frequency to every other night, use as tolerated. Have an 'adaption period' when using retinol.WEEK 1-2: Frequency: use every other day at nightHow to Use : After cleansing, at the moisturizer step, apply a small amount to areas of concern. e.g. under eyes, mouth, forehead and neck. Recommended amount : 0.1ml per section / 1 grain of riceWEEK 3: Frequency: may apply everyday at night.How to use : After cleansing, at the moisturizer step, may spread over the entire face.The "building tolerance" phase can be shortened or extended depending on individual differences. Maintain this phase until no discomfort is experienced. Gradually increase frequency and areas of application.Precautions: Retinol is a high potency product, this item should be incorporated into an existing routine slowly.IngredientsWater, Caprylic/capric Triglyceride, Propanediol, Glycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Trehalose, Panthenol, Butyrospermum Parkii (shea) Butter, Glycine Soja (soybean) Oil, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp Copolymer, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Helianthus Annuus (sunflower) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Glyceryl Stearate, Polysilicone-11, Sodium Sulfite, Tocopherol, Daucus Carota Sativa (carrot) Root Extract, Retinol(0.1%), Allantoin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Oryza Sativa (rice) Bran Wax, Tocotrienols, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Palmitic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Sorbitan Isostearate, Elaeis Guineensis (palm) Oil, BHT, Beta-carotene, Myristic Acid, Lauric Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Limnanthes Alba (meadowfoam) Seed Oil, 3-o-ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Glutathione, Sodium Hyaluronate, 1,2-hexanediol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: START SMALL AND SLOW! After using essence or serum, pat a small amount using your ring finger. Apply evenly over the face, neck, and onto parts with wrinkle concerns. Limit initial use to three times per week; gradually increase frequency to every other night, use as tolerated. Have an 'adaption period' when using retinol.WEEK 1-2: Frequency: use every other day at nightHow to Use : After cleansing, at the moisturizer step, apply a small amount to areas of concern. e.g. under eyes, mouth, forehead and neck. Recommended amount : 0.1ml per section / 1 grain of riceWEEK 3: Frequency: may apply everyday at night.How to use : After cleansing, at the moisturizer step, may spread over the entire face.The "building tolerance" phase can be shortened or extended depending on individual differences. Maintain this phase until no discomfort is experienced. Gradually increase frequency and areas of application.Precautions: Retinol is a high potency product, this item should be incorporated into an existing routine slowly.

reviews.headline: Onion smell
reviews.comments: It smells like onion. Is that normal??? It LITERALLY smells like onions. Im scsred to keep usi my it.

reviews.headline: My favorite retinol
reviews.comments: This brand never disappoints! I will be repurchasing this product when I run out. Doesnt smell or cause me any irritation. I have dry sensitive skin so this product is perfect

reviews.headline: Does very little and goes bad quickly
reviews.comments: The amount of retinol is minimal and honestly does not show any noticeable results. It also went bad pretty quickly and started to smell like pungent onions (no smell initially).

reviews.headline: Buy it!!!
reviews.comments: Great intro to retinol. I have sensitive, acne prone, oily skin. This did not irritate my skin, and honestly it has improved my acne. My skin has never looked better with Cosrx and i've been struggling with my skin since middle school. I am now 26.

reviews.headline: The best product I've ever put on my face
reviews.comments: This stuff is GOLD. I had never used retinol and read that a small percentage is the best way to start and wow. Every night I put this on my skin is instantly dewy, glowy, and looks so fresh. It's been a game changer in my skin care routine

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review thanks to @COSRX and @influenster. I am impressed with the results I have received in just 1 week! I have added this COSRX The Retinol 0.1 Cream to my usual skincare regimen and I'm really shocked with how quickly I noticed improvements! I'm beginning to get some dark circles as I'm nearing the big 4 0 in a couple years and this change in my under eye area and little discoloration has had me really self-conscious, but when I added this retinol cream to my daily skincare regimen I began noticing right away that where I have the troublesome darkness under my eyes and uneven skin tone, the areas have began to brighten a bit and I love the more even skin tone I've noticed recently. I really love the formula because it's so creamy and feels really nice and hydrating immediately after applying it to my face and neck areas. Also this is a great retinol cream to prevent early signs of aging and who doesn't want a miracle formula for this purpose right? This was my first time trying a product from this brand but it definitely won't be the last! I definitely recommend this product to anyone who's in need of a new affordable retinol cream and just doesn't know which one's work or don't work and which one's they can expect to see results with. I am very excited to try more products from COSRX! Thanks so much for this amazing opportunity! #COSRX #dermskincare #influenster #freshfavesvoxbox
faceoff_positive.headline: Loving this COSRX The Retinol 0.1Cream!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I know that rednal is great for your skin at all but I notice that this one is very drying a little bit more than usual and that's why. I'm a little bit on the fence with it. I don't know if it's doing such a great job that it's drawing out my skin because I know retinal can be harsh the 1st couple of weeks you use it. It takes time to build-up your skin to be able to accept. But at the same time I don't know if my skin is just overly sensitive and not doing so well with it so that's why I'm a. Little bit fifty about it definitely we'll keep using it and seeing but I wish it was a little bit more hydrating
faceoff_negative.headline: A bit drying
